column2: English
Training
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. TARGET IS SECURED. SEND IN THE EXTRACTION TEAM. ALPHA OUT.
WE HAVE BLACK HAWK DOWN, WE HAVE BLACK HAWK DOWN...
ALPHA IS AT THE BLACK HAWK CRASH SITE. WAITING FURTHER ORDERS. OVER.
PAPA BEAR WE HAVE LOCATED THE PILOTS. OVER.
PAPA BEAR THIS IS ALPHA BLACK. THE AREA IS SECURE FOR SAR PACKAGE. SEND THEM IN. OVER.
ALPHA BLACK IS COUNTED. LETS ROLL. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. BOTH PILOTS HAVE BEEN DRAGGED TO THE DOWNED HELO. OVER.
THIS IS BRAVO BLACK. WE ARE TAKING CASUALTIES! NEED SOME SUPPORT NOW! OVER.
BRAVO BLACK. WERE GOOD TO GO. OVER.
CHARLIE UNLOADING THE BACKUP FORCE. OVER.
CIVILIANS ARE ON BOARD. MOVING BACK TO NATO TERRITORY. CHARLIE OUT.
GET READY PEOPLE, LZ IN SIGHT!
WE'RE HIT! WE'RE HIT! GOING DOWN, WE ARE GOING DOWN!
KILO BLACK AT THE CRASH SITE. OVER.
THIS IS KILO BLACK. WE WILL DRAG BODIES TO THE LZ, PROCEED WITH THE EXTRACTION. KILO OUT.
KILO BLACK ON BOARD AND READY TO GO. OVER.
WE ARE READY TO EXTRACT. GET READY TO BOARD THE HELO. OVER.
DUST OFF. WERE GOING HOME BOYS. EVERYBODY MOVE OUT. OVER.
PAPA BEAR BE ADVICED. ALL FRIENDLY FORCES HAVE RETURNED TO HOME BASE. OVER.
THIS IS SEAL ONE. SATCHEL CHARGES ARE SET. DOWNED BLACKHAWK IS RIGGED TO BLOW. OVER.
COPY ALPHA. PROCEED AND SECURE THE CRASH SITE. BRAVO WILL SECURE THE TARGET AREA. OVER.
ROGER. YOU MUST FIND THE BLACK HAWK PILOTS. OVER.
DRAG THE PILOTS INTO CRASH SITE AND SECURE IT UNTIL WE GET SAR ON SCENE. OVER.
ALPHA BLACK BE ADVICED WE ARE SENDING PLATOON OF M1A1 ABRAMS TO SUPPORT YOU. OVER.
ALPHA BLACK THIS IS PAPA BEAR. BE ADVICED WE HAVE TWO APACHE GUNSHIPS ENROUTE TO SUPPORT YOU. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. SAR PACKAGE IS READY. WHEN YOU FEEL ITS SECURE ENOUGH, USE RADIO TO MAKE THE CALL. DO NOT I REPEAT DO NOT COMPROMISE THE SAR TEAM IS THAT CLEAR. OVER.
ALL FORCES INTO THE TARGET SITE FOR EXTRACTION. WE ARE DONE HERE. PAPA BEAR OUT.
ALPHA BLACK. BE ADVICED WE HAVE SAR PACKAGE ENROUTE CALLSIGN KILO BLACK. ETA THREE MINUTES. KEEP THE CRASH SITE SECURE. PAPA BEAR OUT.
UNDERSTOOD ALPHA. OVER.
PMC Operation Liberty
Time to help some civilians
